mapper.sql: formatid AS formatId ,name ,startline ,delimiter ,pos_date AS posDate ,pos_partner AS posPartner ,pos_amount AS posAmount ,pos_comment AS posAmount ,fmt_date AS fmtDate ,fmt_amount_thousand AS fmtAmountThousand ,fmt_amount_decimal AS fmtAmountDecimal ,pos_partner_alt AS posPartnerAlt ,pos_partner_alt_pos_key AS posPartnerAltPosKey ,pos_partner_alt_keyword AS posPartneraltKeyword
mapper.select: SELECT FROM cmp_data_formats WHERE formatid = #{id} LIMIT 1
